title: Cannot retrieve Firefox account bookmarks and passwords
content:
Hey guys,

I kinda need your help. I just switched from Windows to Manjaro Linux and I cannot retrieve my Firefox bookmarks and passwords. I do not have access to the old setup because I have formatted the disk and I have only this one on Linux.

I have used my Firefox account multiple times in order to login on a new device and every time it has retrieved my bookmarks and passwords but not this time. Before logging in from this device I had to reset my Firefox password because I had forgot it -- is this a security measure maybe?

Are my bookmarks and passwords gone forever? Thanks!

title: Firefox 131 and Billpay no longer compatible
content:
Since the recent update to Firefox 131, I can no longer use the Billpay option of my TD Bank account. I am able to log into my account without any problems and use all of the options except for Billpay. I want to add that I know I am not alone with this problem as I have seen several others with the same problem but with different banks. It is the Billpay option which no longer works.

As I said, the bank site is fine until I click on "Billpay", Then I get this: begin quote: "Why can't I access Bill Pay?

You might have cookies blocked or cross-site tracking prevented. Depending on what browser you're using, check your settings for these terms: 

   Block third party cookies    Cookie tracking    Cross-site tracking

Make sure cookies are not blocked and cross-site tracking is enabled. Follow any additional instructions in your browser once you have adjusted these settings.

Copyright © 2024, TD Bank, N. A.. All rights reserved." end quote.

I have disabled uBlock Origin, Enhanced Tracking, tried Private Mode, Troubleshooting Mode to no avail.

I have also cleared cookies & data. This appears specific to v131. Any suggestions??
creator: Straggler

content:
I have been using the Bank of America website for many years. I have not made any changes to the settings! With the recent update of Firefox Bill Payment on the websited stopped working and I get:

You might have cookies blocked or cross-site tracking prevented. Depending on what browser you're using, check your settings for these terms:

title: How to get Firefox to use an existing profile without moving or copying it?
content:

(The profile is placed on a third independent data partition!) I cannot find any information on how to do it. All information I find involves moving the profile, but then Firefox on Ubuntu would not be able to continue to use it.

I look forward to hear from you. Thank you. :-)

title: non si accede ai siti pubblici utilizzando la CNS
content: da qualche giorno non riesco ad accedere ai siti pubblici che prevedono l'accesso con CNS (esempio agenzia delle entrate) mozilla rilascia questa info di errore: "Connessione sicura non riuscita Si è verificato un errore durante la connessione a dichiarazioneprecompilatasc.agenziaentrate.gov.it. Un modulo PKCS #11 ha restituito il valore CKR_GENERAL_ERROR: questo significa che si è verificato di un errore irreversibile. Codice di errore: SEC_ERROR_PKCS11_GENERAL_ERROR La pagina che si sta cercando di visualizzare non può essere mostrata in quanto non è possibile verificare l’autenticità dei dati ricevuti. Contattare il responsabile del sito web per informarlo del problema." Ho contattaro Aruba gestore della CNS e mi riferisce che il problema è nel settaggio di Mozilla. Infatti se utilizzo Crome non ho problemi. Come risolvere? Grazie

title: Cierre de sesiones al cerrar pestañas
content:
Creo que he encontrado un problema con cierre de sesiones en Google y Aliexpress.

Si cierro una pestaña con sesión iniciada en esas páginas la sesión se me cierra en todas las pestañas en donde tengo esas mismas sesiones abiertas.

Por ejemplo, tengo varias pestañas de Aliexpress abiertas con varios productos diferentes en cada una. En todas las pestañas tengo la sesión de mi usuario abierta. Si cierro una de esas pestañas y me voy a otra de las que quedan abiertas para ver otro producto, al llegar, ha cerrado la sesión y tengo que volver a hacer login.

Lo mismo para Google, en una pestaña tengo Gmail, en otra Google Drive y en otra una búsqueda de Google, todas con sesión iniciada. Si cierro la pestaña con la búsqueda, me cierra las sesiones de las otras 2 pestañas.

Espero que lo revisen y si hiciese falta podría dar más datos.
creator: frikinyo

title: Firefox hesabımı eşitleme sorunu
content: Firefoz hesabımı her açıp eşitleme yapmaya niyetlendiğimde ğişman oluyorum. Çünkü son haliyle eşitleme yapmıyor. Anlamlandıramadığım şekilde çok eski yer imlerini alıp onlarla güncelliyor. Halbuki chrome kullanımı oldukça kolay ve eşitleme konusunda çok başarılı. Örneğin 1. bilsayarımı çok kullanıyorum ve yer imlerini güncel olarak kullanıyorum. 2. bilgisayarımı açıp firefox hesabımı açtıktan sonra beklentim 1. bilgisayarımda en son bıraktığım haliyle açmak. Ama firefox hesap güncellemesini çoook eski verilerle güncelliyor. tüm yer imlerim değişmiş, son açtığım sayfalar gitmiş oluyor yada fazlasıyla eklenmiş oluyor. Memnun değilim. Chrome böyle değil.
creator: drbilgeo

title: After update from Firefox 131B to 132B speaker icons on tabs are gone? Only an empty circle remains.
content:
Running 132B3 the speaker icon besides the favicon to indicate playback in the tab is missing ever since updating to 132 first (see attached image). On 131 it was a speaker icon which you could use to mute/unmute tabs which showed up when audio or video was playing.

Compact density, title bar and menu bar is enabled along with Simple white by Moomin-theme and an added userChrome.css which can be seen here: https://pastebin.com/cLt2bSnR Along with a few changed preferences in about:config but those probably won't matter in this case?

Guess it's missing additional stuff in userChrome.css to get it working as before again? Or were the icons pulled from Firefox itself so the problem is accessing/referencing to them in the first place, hence why it's an empty circle now?

On Reddit a hover override from https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1338919 was suggested but adding that didn't change the icons' behaviour unfortunately. Hovering over with the mouse cursor manually just fills out the circle with black.

Any help in the matter is appreciated, best regards!
creator: WakeX

title: Alerta: Potencial risco de segurança à frente
content:
OLá

Meu site não representa risco à segurança, nem tem conteúdo. É um HTTPS!!! Vocês estão sendo radicais sem motivo. Existe presunção de boa fé, é questão jurídica! Isso atrapalha os meus negócios e de gente como eu gera conteúdo para WEB. As vossas regras de segurança vão contra o princípio de boa fé e nem foi verificado o contreúdo, pois não tem ainda!

Por favor, liberar o meu site, pois não representa risco algum!

Atenciosamente, Eusébio J.A.Gomes

title: Tekst selecteren, niet "verplaatsen"
content:
Het komt steeds vaker voor dat als ik tekst wil selecteren in een website of zelfs in de browser zelf (bijv URL bar), op het moment dat ik de muispijl op het begin van de tekst zet en over de tekst beweeg, niet het gewenste deel van de tekst gemarkeerd wordt maar de hele tekst (vanaf een begin wat veel eerder kan liggen dan waar ik de muis neerzet) "verplaatst" wordt met de beweging van de muis.

Ik vind dit nogal irritant, en de vraag is of er ook een setting of about:config pref is waarmee ik dit gedrag kan uitschakelen zodat ik weer gewoon tekst kan selecteren ipv "verplaatsen" (waarvan ik niet eens de functionaliteit snap).

title: Increasingly, Firefox will not process routine actions, for example like signing in to a website with a password, and I have to use a different browser (Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge) to accomplish the task.
content: Increasingly, Firefox will not process routine actions, for example like signing in to a website with a password, and I have to use a different browser (Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge) to accomplish the task. There are other routine actions causing problems as well, but the bottom line is Firefox is losing its functionality and it is forcing me to use other browsers. I am sure you don't want to lose users in the browser wars, so maybe you will take this particular concern seriously, and actually respond to me so I know you are actually out there and taking complaints about Firefox browser performance with the appropriate concern and action regarding this issue.
creator: alanbala
